english_example_sentence: If the guests take this delicious food, they will be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если гости возьмут эту вкусную еду, они будут очень счастливы.
turkish_example_sentence: Misafirler bu lezzetli yemeği alsalar, çok mutlu olurlar.
